|image1   = Tutorial Fishing Line Stabilizer 1.png
|text1    = When you obtain the [[Fishing Line Stabilizer]] from the various Fishing Associations around the world, you can use it to assist in fishing.<br>The Fishing Line Stabilizer will be activated by default. You can actively choose to activate or deactivate the assistance of the Stabilizer.
|image2   = Tutorial Fishing Line Stabilizer 2.png
|text2    = While you are capturing certain fish, you will obtain certain buffs based on the number of the fish of this species that you have caught in the past. For example, when you are within the Ideal Tension Zone, your fishing will progress faster. A Stabilizer at full power can even allow fishing to progress when you are not within the Ideal Tension Zone.<br>If you would like to check the fish species that you have caught, you may visit [[Archive]] > Living Beings.
